modName: Damsels in Distress - Unique Female Followers made mayatola
summary: This is a mod about rescue the life of the followers before they suffer an unknown fate (well, they will be there awaiting even if you never go for them or release them XD).
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Firs of all thanks to:
mayatola for give me permision to make this mod with this followers
Raulito for give me permission to use his creation

Second: excuse my english

Third: The only reason i flagged this as adult-only is because Lilith shows up naked, but once you recruit her she equip her rags.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 20130308: Vanilla rags, wounded idle
Update 20130208: Lilith is now availible
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What this mod do?

This mod relocates the followers made by Mayatola to places where you will find bandits and vampires, gigants, some traps and Draughrs, so they are a plus now when you explore and accept quests, they are located near Whiterun, Riverwood and Dawnstar, once you enter a bandit camp you will find a cage where they are, not all of them, one in each dungeon.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to free them?

Well, is simple, defeat the bosses in each place and pick the lock of the cage, once you pick the lock mantain opened the door, sometimes the idle will still be in them, only await to it end, how you know it has ended? well, they stand up, once rescued they will find a way home, you can just walk away from the place and they will return to the Bannered Mare, Sleeping Giant Inn and Wind Peak Inn or recruit them with you at the moment.
This is not a quest, I want to make it as one but I lack of knowledge to do so, but i like this way.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Where they are?

I´m adding a file with the locations of each one, you can consult it or simply walktrought and find them, I made this because I´m playing a new character from the beggining.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Why i did this?

I like the new followers that everyone release, they are marriageble, but I would like a reason for they to follow you and whant you as spouse/husband, so this is the reason, you rescued them from their evil fate, so you are they hero/heroine.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to install the main followers?
-If you have them recruited dismiss them and await 24hr ingame time
-Get out of any inn like Sleeping Gigant or Bannered Mare
-Download the mod of mayatola Unique Female Followers http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24664
-Download my pluggins
-Install the followers of mayatola
-Copy my pluggins to the /Skyrim/Data folder and overwrite when asked
-Enjoy

How install new update?
Well you gonna have to rescue them again XD, if you don´t want to, don´t update

-If you have them recruited dismiss them and await 24hr ingame time
-If you are using anything that mantains data of followers like AFT reset it, if don´t well, it can present some bugs
-save
-uninstall
-load saved game and wait another 24 hrs in game
-save again
-Get out of any inn like Sleeping Gigant or Bannered Mare
-Reinstall mayatola mod and all you need from there, (like low res if you dont have much power on your pc) Unique Female Followers http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24664
-Download my updated pluggins
-Copy my pluggins to the /Skyrim/Data folder and overwrite when asked
-Enjoy

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BUGS!

Well, thnx to Restutitor Orbis for the feed back, he say this:

-I use AFT (=Amazing Follower Tweaks) instead of UFO, and it seems to work but only let\'s you recruit 1 of these as active at one time. If you find one when adventuring with a previous one, the old one walks away when you recruit the new one. If told to wait at home, they are okay, but you can only have 1 at a time active. Lydia is not affected by any of this.

-I found this too

I see that maybe AFT is adding packages and it collides with my packages

1. rescue and recruit one
2. rescue and recruit the second
3. i can have them both in my team with no problem 
4. i dismiss them, in any order
5. they stay where we are and they doesn´t return to the nearest bar to them

-If they don´t walk away from the cage, dismiss your actual follower, recruit the recently rescued one, escort her outside the dungeon, and dismiss her, sooner or later she will walk away to the inn
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Solutions

-It dont haves trouble if you recruit the first one and leave all the others return to their home and then recruit them at the bar, or if you want to recruit another one diferent from the actuall one in your team, dismiss the actual one and then recruit the new. sorry about that.

-If they don´t walk away from the cage, dismiss your actual follower, recruit the recently rescued one, escort her outside the dungeon, and dismiss her, sooner or later she will walk away to the inn
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This is my first mod released, so It will be bugged in some point but i will fix it if you let me know, i have tested by one real day of play and dind´t found troubles, thnx in advance, hope it likes you.
author: xornfl
